description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Play as the Minotaur... Wandering the world with your axe, destroying everything that tries to harm you. Chop, smash, combo, block and counter your way through entire armies!  Play co-op with 3 friends locally, or up to 7 friends over Xbox Live.  Unravel the mystery of the mysterious falling rocks from the sky!  Paint the ground with the blood of your fallen enemies!
